title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Biochemistry Mastery—Learning Core Concepts Through Song and Interdisciplinary Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can regenerate the five core metabolic pathways in biochemistry (e.g., ATP production, glycolysis, TCA cycle) into song lyrics and explain them with over 80% accuracy.
Learners apply biochemistry concepts to real-world work scenarios using medical humanities and drug development cases.

Within one week, learners apply biomolecular structure analysis data (e.g., protein 3D structures) from biochemistry, IT, and medical fields to visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI, represent them in three or more interactive charts (heatmaps, network graphs, 3D models), and achieve ≥80% scores in peer evaluation rubrics (clarity, accuracy, interactivity)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
